title: (x) Sans w/ specific capital Q shape - P22 Underground {Tiff}
content:
Hi,  
I’m looking for a nice looking font with a capital Q that looks something like the one I made here as an example (attached to this post). do you know of something like this?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [q.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225133204/http:/typophile.com/files/q.gif) | 1.5 KB |

 [‹ (x) Rainbow band logo on Rising album cover - (similar to) Fette Fraktur {Robert Farrelly}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225133204/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40274 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Amazing Race logo squarish sans caps - Eurostile Extd {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225133204/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40266 "Go to next forum topic")
author: uriash

comments.content:
P22 Underground Pro kinda has that Q

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225133204im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/qunderground_5732.gif)
.
Nobel’s Q is a bit different, but it’s close, too.

Which digital Grotesk fonts of today show this kind of Q?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225133204im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/q_5038.jpg)

Its from Elegant-Grotesk (Stempel).

Georg

Yes! it was Underground! thank you very much miss Tiffany!  
Bald Condensed - Neutraface is also a good one. auricfuzz - your’s where a bit different but thanks anyway.
